name: Fumble Quest
description:
A build of a platformer game for the GMTK Game Jam, where you play as Bernadetta. A frog witch who has made a cursed die that creates chaos with every roll. Play around in the castle build of the game where there are monsters to jump on and obstacles to climb over. Each face of the dice does something different:

1 Explosion of Goblins

2 Gust of wind

3 Make the enemies deadly

4 Overcharge Bernadetta

5 Create a Big Slime Monster

6 Pull out Bernadetta's Big Iron

Warning: if you die in the game... the game quits.
